definitions.pao1: puffed; swollen; spongy; small lake (esp. in place names); classifier for urine or feces;
definitions.pao4: bubble; foam; blister (i.e. skin bubble); to soak; to steep; to infuse; to dawdle; to shilly-shally; to hang about; to pick up (a girl); to get off with (a sexual partner); classifier for occurrences of an action; classifier for number of infusions;
